Events.Title: Acts Study | Mens | Lake Orion

Other.Title: Acts Study | Mens | Lake Orion
Other.Description:
In this two book series covering Acts:

Be Dynamic ( Acts 1-12) focuses on Peter's ministry, mostly in Israel and centered in Jerusalem.  Through explaining Luke's record of the Gospel's advancement and church expansion, Wiersbe opens the door to understanding the work of the church today.

Using hard-hitting quotes from recognized names like St. Augustine and John Bunyan, Wiersbe proves himself as a well-read author and gifted writer.  The depth of his study is astounding, yet the accessibility of his text for every age group is evident as well.  He proves what Luke intended-for Acts to be interpreted not as the apostles' glorious acts, but as the life-changing acts of the Holy Spirit.  The same Spirit lives in believers today, the same God calls followers to expand His church, and the same basic problems still arise within the church, but the same power available then is still available now to change the nations.

Be Daring (Acts 13-28): Readers travel through dungeon prisons, see the ancient world as if it were today, and witness the marvelous work God can do through a few souls fully surrendered to His purposes.  They witness Paul's conversion and spot his imperfections, yet still they enter his successes as the Lord uses Him to preach Good News to the lost and dying.  Because there are hardships today, places where God is unwelcome, and people whose hearts are unreceptive, both young and old will benefit from knowing that Paul's God is their God-the God of the ages. They will persevere till the finish line to "win the prize for which God [calls them] heavenward in Christ Jesus" (Philippians 4:13).

Share.URL: mailto:?subject=Go to Acts Study | Mens | Lake Orion&body=Check out this out: https://woodsidebible.org/events/details/?id=317522

Events.Title: Divorce Care | Adults | Romeo
Events.Description:
DivorceCare is a support group for people walking through separation or divorce. At a DivorceCare group, you’ll watch a weekly video with counsel and insights from respected divorce and recovery experts, as well as relatable personal stories—followed by a time of sharing and support. Session topics include anger, loneliness, financial and legal issues, and navigating the relationship with your former spouse. Each lesson is standalone so you can start at any time.
Please join us Tuesdays at 6:30pm, park in the South Entrance as we meet in the Lounge.

DivorceCare for Kids (DC4K) is available for children 5-12 and childcare is available for under 5. Please inform us if children will need childcare prior to attending so we can schedule caregivers.

Share.URL: mailto:?subject=Go to Divorce Care | Adults | Romeo&body=Check out this out: https://woodsidebible.org/events/details/?id=317187

Events.Title: Tuesday PM Bible Study | Men | Lapeer
Events.Description: Join us Tuesday evenings for a time to go through the Bible and see how we can be challenged as men in our faith. This group and our time together will spur us on in our love of Jesus, in our leadership of our families and in being a light to the world around us.

Share.URL: mailto:?subject=Go to Tuesday PM Bible Study | Men | Lapeer&body=Check out this out: https://woodsidebible.org/events/details/?id=315810
